mods.name: New Adventures

Adds a new event in which you have to travel.

mods.name: Sex Note 01
mods.description:
The event takes place at once with three girls who will magically appear in the room of the main character.
To activate an event, go to Cheats and select the Events window.
mods.author: Anfier
